content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.wireless_apps_pic32cxbz2_wbz45_legacy_adv_sleep
content.displayName: BLE Legacy Advertisment and Sleep Application
content.shortDescription: This example application users to enable 'sleep/standby' mode with BLE Advertisements on WBZ451 Curiosity board using MPLAB Code Configurator(MCC) In this basic application example the advertisement interval will be set to 1 sec.The advertisement interval will dictate the application sleep time MCU32 to team about the nameing conversion for applications.
content.author: Microchip
